bug_reports.title: MS11 bot fails to detect vendor NPCs in Mos Eisley
bug_reports.description: The bot's NPC detection system is not properly identifying vendor NPCs in the Mos Eisley cantina area. This affects automated trading and item purchasing workflows. The issue appears to be related to lighting conditions and NPC positioning variance.
reproductionSteps: Navigate MS11 bot to Mos Eisley cantina
Attempt to initiate vendor trading sequence
Observe NPC detection failure in console logs

comments.author: dev-alice
comments.content: Investigating the OCR patterns for vendor identification. May need to update the training data.

bug_reports.title: SWGDB heroic loot tables showing incorrect drop rates
bug_reports.description: The loot tables on heroic pages are displaying inaccurate drop rate percentages. The calculation appears to be off by approximately 15-20% compared to actual MS11 session data.
reproductionSteps: Navigate to any heroic page (e.g., IG-88)
Compare displayed drop rates with raw session data

comments.author: dev-bob
comments.content: Found the issue in the statistics aggregation function. Working on a fix.

bug_reports.title: Missing quest data for Naboo legacy quests
bug_reports.description: Several legacy quests from Naboo are not appearing in the quest database. This affects quest completion tracking and progress statistics.
reproductionSteps: Compare with known legacy quest list

bug_reports.title: Bot crashes when attempting Krayt Dragon hunt
bug_reports.description: MS11 bot experiences fatal crashes during Krayt Dragon hunting sequences. The crash occurs consistently at the 75% health mark of the Ancient Krayt Dragon encounter.
reproductionSteps: Initiate Krayt Dragon hunt with MS11 bot
Monitor bot behavior at 75% dragon health

bug_reports.title: Mobile responsive layout breaks on heroic pages
bug_reports.description: The loot table UI becomes unusable on mobile devices with screen widths below 480px. Tables overflow and navigation buttons are inaccessible.

comments.author: dev-diana
comments.content: Fixed with improved CSS media queries and table responsive design. Deployed in v1.2.4.
